author: deedubbu
msg: Formalize document and window event listeners and allow plugins to override event listeners.
This change moves the BlackBerry code inline with Android.

author: deedubbu
msg: Fixes #44. handlers variable needs to be an object not an array.
The PhoneGap.Channel.handlers property needs to be an object instead
of an array.  Some JavaScript frameworks extend Array and create
havoc with the "for x in var" loop.
